title: Trump's China Strategy - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/5/18
itunes:title: Trump's China Strategy - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/5/18
description:
George Noory and Dr. Herb London discuss President Trump's strategies to deal with China, both economically and militarily, and how this will impact the world's changing geopolitical climate.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
